title: A letter sent to the Hono[ra]ble William Lenthal Esq. speaker of the Honorable House of Commons : concerning Sir Thomas Fairfax's rovting of the enemy in the West, neer Bodman, March 8, 1645 : together with the Lord Hoptons answer to Sir Thomas Fairfax's summons.
author: Rushworth, John, 1612?-1690.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Edw. Husband ... and are to be sold at his shop ...,
